title: HTL Girls Community Kickoff Meetup
description: Welcome meetup for new and returning members. Agenda: intros, goals, and community roadmap.

title: WhatsApp Onboarding Session
description: How to join the HTL Girls WhatsApp group, community rules, and Q&A.

title: Workshop: Arduino Basics for Beginners
description: Hands-on intro to Arduino and sensors. Bring your laptop if possible.

title: Mentoring Circle #1
description: Small-group mentoring with role models from industry and universities.

title: Info Session: Diplomarbeitswettbewerb
description: How to apply, evaluation criteria, prizes, and timeline.

title: Community Study Jam
description: Bring your homework or project—coworking with peer support.

title: Role Model Talk: Women in Cybersecurity
description: Insights into careers, certifications, and study paths in security.

title: Parents Info Night: Why HTL?
description: For parents & guardians—curriculum, career options, and support network.

title: School Visit & Mini-Workshop (HTL Spengergasse)
description: Intro to electronics & coding; meet the HTL Girls community leads.

title: Community Networking Evening
description: Speed networking, project pitches, and snack break.

title: End-of-Year Community Gathering
description: Casual get-together, reflections on 2025, and plans for 2026.

title: New Year Kickoff & Goal Setting
description: Vision board, learning goals, and project groups for the semester.

title: Workshop: Presenting Your Diploma Project
description: Structure, storytelling, and demo tips; short practice pitches.

title: Hackday: Build & Learn
description: Day-long build session—teams form on-site; bring a laptop.

title: ALISMA Community Summit 2026
description: Keynotes, project showcases, networking, and awards.
